Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation

Interface Summary
DelegatingValidator.DelegateSource Returns a delegating validator
GeneralValidation A general validation
PropertyValidation A property validation
Validator.PropertyRetrieveStrategy Strategy for retrieving a property
 

Class Summary
AbstractPositiveValidation Validates a value as being positive
AbstractValueValidation Validates that the property value is one / none of the given values
AnyOfValidation Validates that the property value is one of the given values
CardFormatValidation  
CompareToValidation Invokes compareTo, the three booleans in the constructor determines whether -1, 0 or 1 are accepted as valid
DelegatingValidator Validator that delegates validation to an external validator
EmailValidation Validation for e-mails
EmptyValidation Validates a property value to be empty or null
InetAddrValidation Validates an internet address, either a host name or IP address
InstanceOfValidation A validation for a property which should be a class name assignable to the given class
InvalidError Error for invalid data
LengthValidation Validates a length constraint
MaxLengthError Error for max length validation
MinLengthError Error for min length validation
NoneOfValidation Validates that the property value is one of the given values
NotAllowedError NullValidation error; when a field must be null, but is not.
NumericValidation  
PasswordsDontMatchError Error indicating passwords that don't match
PeriodValidation  
PositiveNonZeroValidation Validates a positive and non zero number
PositiveValidation Validates a positive number
PropertyValidationError A validation error that forces to be handled as a property error
RegexValidation Login validation
RequiredError Required data validation error
RequiredValidation Validates a required field
TodayValidation Abstract Property validation
UniqueError Unique data validation error
URLValidation A validation for urls
ValidationError Indicates a validation error
Validator This class has the information needed to validate an object.
Validator.BeanPropertyRetrieveStrategy Bean style property retrieving strategy
 

Enum Summary
PeriodValidation.ValidationType The possible required validations: only begin is required, only end or both.
 

Exception Summary
ValidationException Indicates data validation exception. it contains nested validation errors
